component.name: PCem
component.summary: An emulator for classic IBM PC clones

description.p: PCem is an emulator for various classic IBM PC clones. It supports various models of PCs, graphics and sound cards, and CPUs.
To use PCem you will need to dump BIOS ROMs for each machine you want to emulate and place them in ~/.var/app/uk.co.pcem_emulator.pcem/.pcem/roms/.
This version of PCem is sandboxed. You have to copy all the files to your Documents directory.
